entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -22.1°C

Observed at: Sparwood Airport 12:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
